definition: abbr. for 外籍勞工|外籍劳工[wai4 ji2 lao2 gong1]/foreign worker
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)

sentences.english: "This is our migrant worker training centre, " Yusuf says, pointing to an empty building.
sentences.chinese: “這裏是外勞培訓中心，”尤瑟夫指着一個空房子說。

sentences.english: We bring in foreign workers to meet the needs of our economic development.
sentences.chinese: 我們引進外勞，是爲了滿足經濟發展的需要。

sentences.english: “This is our migrant worker training centre,” Yusuf says, pointing to an empty building.
sentences.chinese: “這裏是外勞培訓中心，”尤瑟夫指着一個空房子說。

sentences.english: To enforce the policy pertaining to the A. R. C. livelihood management regulations.
sentences.chinese: 執行外勞生活管理規則所訂各項規定。

sentences.english: The Government will continue to monitor this closely and control inflows. Recently I met some ASEAN journhasists.
sentences.chinese: 政府也很介意這個題目，我們將接續控制外勞的流入。

sentences.english: The Government will continue to monitor this closely and control inflows.
sentences.chinese: 政府也很注意這個問題，我們將繼續控制外勞的流入。

sentences.english: We make foreign workers to meet the needs of our economic development.
sentences.chinese: 我們引進外勞，是爲了饜足經濟生長的必要。

definition: employee/person employed in a trade or profession
